Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class GameClearScreen

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.AbstractGameScreen
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.GameClearScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class GameClearScreen extends AbstractGameScreen
Represents the screen displayed when the player successfully completes the game. This screen shows a background image and the player's final score. Extends the AbstractGameScreen to inherit common screen functionalities such as rendering and input handling.
